effect.short: Strikes before a target's priority move.
effect.full: TM229

effect.short: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.
effect.full: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

effect.short: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.
effect.full: The user emits a hot flame from its forehead and hurls itself at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

effect.short: User attacks first.
effect.full: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

effect.short: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.
effect.full: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.short: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.
effect.full: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.short: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.
effect.full: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

effect.short: Raises Attack and Defense.
effect.full: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.
The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.
The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

effect.short: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

effect.full: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move’s power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

effect.short: May confuse opponent.
effect.full: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

effect.short: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

effect.short: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
effect.full: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.short: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.
effect.full: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

effect.short: May cause flinching.

effect.short: User receives recoil damage.
effect.full: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

effect.short: Move's power and type changes with the weather.
effect.full: This move’s type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

effect.short: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

effect.short: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.
effect.full: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

effect.short: Always results in a critical hit and ignores stat changes.

effect.short: May put opponent to sleep.
effect.full: Wicked Torque deals damage and has a 10% chance of putting the target to sleep.

effect.short: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

effect.short: User receives recoil damage.

effect.short: Burns opponent.

The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

effect.short: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

effect.short: Raises user's Defense.

effect.short: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.
